participant_1.background:
My mother is a little old-fashioned and worries about my choice of career, but my dad is proud of my success.
i do not like working long hours.
i brew my own beer.
i have woman calling me all the time.
I keep secrets from my parents.

participant_2.background:
I have a cat named Sherlock who loves to watch mystery movies with me.
I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time.
I'm not an excellent cook, but I do my best to make meals that my mom enjoys.
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
I try to keep myself fit and healthy, but I haven't been in a relationship for a long time.

content.text: Hi there! How are you?
I am doing well! I just got done watching some mystery movies with my cat Sherlock.
That sounds like a great way to spend an evening. My dog loves to watch movies with me too.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He is the sweetest dog in the world.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I have always wanted one.
They are the best dogs! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to read mystery novels, cook, and spend time with my family.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to read mystery novels too. I also like to brew my own beer.
That's so cool! I have always wanted to try brewing my own beer.
It's really easy! You can find all the supplies you need online.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun. Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets. I would love to have a cat, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for that responsibility.
I see. Well, I have a dog and a cat. They are both great companions.
I'm sure they are! I've heard that cats can be very independent.
They can be, but they can also be very affectionate.
I guess I'll just have to find out for myself someday.
You should! They're great pets.
Thanks for the advice!
No problem!
